title: Turkey Burgers
directions: Mix ingredients together and form 4-6 patties. Grill on medium heat for 7 minutes a side. 2 minutes before burgers are done, place a slice of cheese (optional) on each patty. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 lb. ground turkey meat (prefer thigh meat)
1/2 cup fresh parsley, minced (or whatever fresh herbs you like)
